source: get to the bottom of things
lemma: get to the bottom of things
definitions: To discover the real truth or cause of something, especially something mysterious, problematic, or complex.
To investigate thoroughly to find the underlying facts or reasons.
examples: The detective vowed to get to the bottom of things.
We need to get to the bottom of things to prevent it from happening again.
It took a while, but they finally got to the bottom of things.
